Articles.Content:
Only three? Or more than three? I got moar than three.

The user below me does not abbreviate 'The User Below Me'.

nope

TUBM has at least 2 reputation rectangles

False

The user below me could derive the quadratic formula without cheating

Medium-level algebra makes me freak out, so no.

The user below me is a lackey and a serf.

Sorry. Neither, neighbor.

These 3 things are ALL true of the user below me:

A) has never been below water to a depth of greater than 2 atmospheres (66 feet on Earth).

has never touched a koala bear

C) has eaten venison at least once.

Sorry, number C is not true.

TUBM is confused by number C.

No, c is 299 792 458 m/s.

The user below me know at least three more numbers that are often represented by letters.

Let's see, there's E, I think, F, M, A... X, Y, Z... Wow, there's actually a lot. Of standard ones anyway, I suppose it's possible to use all letters as variables.

TUBM has a disliking of math.

I goddamn love probability. You take that back!

The user below me has a dislike of acronyms.

Nope. NASA, BSA, Etc. I love 'em!

TUBM knows the Ã¢Ë†â€ -v equation off of the top of their head.

Close, but no. I had to stop and really think.

All 3 of these are true of TUBM :

A) male

has swung an axe against a tree or log at least once

C) has never heard of a self-sealing stem bolt

All true!

TUBM likes making lists.

Yes, I like listing.

The User Below Me:

1 - LOVES KSP

2 - Likes Math

3 - Is younger than 18 years of age

Wrong, I'm older

TUBM posts a reply to confirm he's an idiot

Um wait am i one?

TUBM likes to fly rockets AND planes and does wackjob creations.

I like to fly planes and rocket, but most of them are small and efficient.

TUBM has yet to outsmart bullet.

No, I've actually done it twice.

TUBM wants to be an astronaut.

Maybe. *sniff* Maybe.

I've yet to meet one that has gone to Eeloo.

I've sent spacecraft to Eeloo:

They were unmanned.

Anyway, the user below me has been to the magic boulder, and can re-create the magic boulder using Kopernicus (please, please do make a magic boulder for Kopernicus).

Nope, not even with hyperedit.

TUBM is a fan of TF2.

Maybe. *sniff* Maybe.

I've yet to meet one that can outsmart Scott Manley.

I most certainly cannot outsmart illectro.

TUBM did not know Scott Manley's username till now.

False.

The user below me is a fan of the Souls game series.

NOPE star wars galactic battlegrounds saga is better

tubm is not from america

Nope.

TUBM is in school now.
